directions: Brown onion and garlic in oil over medium heat.  Stir in lentil soup and tomatoes.  Bring to boil. Stir in spinach and spices. Simmer.
Meanwhile, cook pasta in a large pot of boiling salted water until almost done.  Drain.  Mix pasta into lentil sauce.  Cover, and keep warm for 20 minutes.  Serve with Parmesan cheese.
title: Wendy's Quick Pasta and Lentils
